1 Text: Five components of a military symbol?
2 Text: Frame (shape), Fill (color), Icon (entity type), Modifiers (capability), Amplifiers (text/graphic).
Symbol Identification Code. 20-digit code defining any military symbol.
Coordinated Fire Line. Permissive FSCM expediting fires beyond line.
Fire Support Coordination Line. Permissive, established by Corps+.
No Fire Area. Restrictive FSCM prohibiting fires in area.
Restrictive Fire Line. Prohibits fires across line (linkup ops).
Single words: colors, names, objects. Placed on recognizable terrain.
